articles.description: How to get Puri ticket in Google Pay? Here is everything you need to know about getting a Puri ticket through the recent G-Pay promotional event. Get details.
articles.content: Google Pay has started a new promotional campaign where users can virtually travel to various cities around India to earn rewards of up to 501. The campaign has been titled 'Go India' and it is live … [+2135 chars]

articles.title: Gold prices fall sharply to Rs 50,665 per 10 gram, silver tanks Rs 4,268 a kg - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: The broader trend on COMEX could be in the range of $1,860- 1,915 and on domestic front prices could hover in the range of Rs 49,600-50,900, said Damani.
articles.content: Gold prices dropped by Rs 1,755 to Rs 50,665 per 10 gram in the Mumbai retail market on rupee weakness and sharp sell-off yesterday in the overseas market. The precious metal pared some of the losses… [+4014 chars]

articles.title: Exide Industries Q2 net up 4% at Rs 257 crore - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: Revenue from operations rose to Rs 4,011.39 crore for the quarter under review, as against Rs 3,778.51 crore in the year-ago period, Exide Industries said in a regulatory filing.
articles.content:
Battery maker Exide Industries on November 10 posted a 3.81 percent increase in consolidated net profit at Rs 256.62 crore for the quarter ended September.
